title: Faculty Payroll Inquiry
description: A new faculty member has a question about a deduction on their first paycheck.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and retrieve their latest pay stub.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely identifies the employee and accesses their payroll record.

tasks.description: Identify the deduction in question and look up its definition in the HR system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the deduction is for their selected retirement plan contribution.

tasks.description: Explain the deduction to the faculty member by referencing the benefits they selected during onboarding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the deduction and resolves the inquiry.
